snippet: Matt Kuchar continued his stellar play from the Masters by putting together a strong start at the RBC Heritage on Hilton Head Island, S.C.
abstract: Matt Kuchar continues his stellar play from the Masters and shares first-round lead at RBC Heritage on Hilton Head Island, SC.
lead_paragraph: Matt Kuchar continued his stellar play from the Masters by putting together a strong start at the RBC Heritage on Hilton Head Island, S.C.

headline.main: Kuchar Shares Lead at RBC Heritage
headline.print_headline: Kuchar Shares Lead at RBC Heritage
